segments.text: Looking at this kitchen, I notice the sink is overflowing badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is just cascading over the edge, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing there, oblivious, drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress will get wet if she doesn't turn around soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One foot is already in the puddle, how can she not feel it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids, they're climbing on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretched out, grabbing cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's dangerous, the stool looks like it's about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just encouraging him, reaching up too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden is peaceful, what a contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is so irresponsible, it makes me mad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to stop this before there's a big mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting ruined by the water.
segments.speaker: PAR
